bike.description: OCLV Mountain Carbon main frame & seatstay, alloy chainstay, removable Carbon Armor, ABP Convert, E2 fully integrated tapered head tube, BB95, Flow Mold carbon swing link, internal control routing, internal shock routing, Micro Truss, G2 Geometry, 100mm travel

components.description: Fox Evolution Series 32 Float w/CTD (climb-trail-descend) remote FIT damper, rebound, E2 tapered steerer, 15QR thru axle, custom G2 Geometry w/51mm offset, 100mm travel
Fox Evolution Series Float w/CTD (climb-trail-descend) remote damper, rebound, tuned by Trek in California, 6.5x1.5"
Bontrager Race Lite Tubeless Ready w/Stacked Lacing, 15mm front, 142x12 rear
Bontrager XR1 Team Issue Tubeless Ready, aramid bead, 29x2.20"
Shimano Deore XT, low direct mount
Bontrager Race X Lite Carbon Low Riser, 31.8mm, 5mm rise
Cane Creek IS-3, E2, alloy cartridge
